-s.description: searches for anime. Example use: -s noragami

-ulist.description: Checks for updates to add to the list

-su.description: Searches for a user stats. Example use: -su anilistname

-w.description: adds anime to any list (completed, dropped, ect). Example use: -w noragami

-l.description: Looks up steam games. Example use: -l gamename

closer.description: Closes everything. edit closer config file to add programs to it.

-c.description: Compares your list with another. Example use: -c anilistname

-twt.description: This lets you see total time it takes to watch an anime.
